trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnCollection object contains a set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects that are typically used to define the columns of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto GridViewColumnCollection contém um conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objetos que são normalmente usados para definir as colunas de uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> that defines the layout of data in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>que define o layout dos dados em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To receive notification of changes in the collection, monitor the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event that is inherited from <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: Para receber notificação de alterações na coleção, monitorar o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>evento que é herdado do <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Removes all of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objetos do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> na coleção no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a new item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> without replacing another item.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um novo item no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>sem substituir outro item.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To replace an item in the collection with a new item, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir um item na coleção com um novo item, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.SetItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position to place the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição para colocar o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> para inserir.

trans-unit.source: Changes the position of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Altera a posição de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The original position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição original do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A nova posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection%601.CollectionChanged> eventos quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: A posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> para remover.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is at the specified index with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> que está no índice especificado com outro <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection> with a new column.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui uma coluna de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>com uma nova coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: To insert a new column without replacing another column, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para inserir uma nova coluna sem substituir a outra coluna, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection.InsertItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position at which the new <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> replaces the old <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A posição na qual o novo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> substitui o antigo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> to place at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> para colocar na posição especificada.
